text: Rocío Carrasco Mohedano, informally Rociíto (born 29 April 1977), is a Spanish TV presenter and business woman. She is the daughter of the Spanish singer Rocío Jurado and the Spanish boxer Pedro Carrasco. She was married to Antonio David Flores, a former Guardia Civil officer who is better known for his highly publicized relationship with Nuria Bermúdez. Rocío and Antonio divorced in 2000. ==External links== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish actresses Category:Spanish female singers Category:Spanish television actresses Category:21st-century Spanish singers Category:21st- century women singers
title: Rocío Carrasco
